tool_description: Generates HTML and CSS templates for review widgets based on configuration settings and review data structure.

template_style.description: Template style: modern, classic, minimal, or card_based

layout_direction.description: Layout direction: horizontal, vertical, or grid

include_reviewer_info.description: Include reviewer name and verification status

star_style.description: Star rating style: filled, outlined, or custom

error_messages: Invalid template_style: Use one of [modern, classic, minimal, card_based].
Invalid layout_direction: Use one of [horizontal, vertical, grid].
Invalid star_style: Use one of [filled, outlined, custom].

usage: Specify template_style and layout_direction to generate appropriate HTML/CSS templates. Customize appearance with optional styling parameters.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated template
